${ModID}:FiredUpAbility.NAME: Fired Up!
${ModID}:FiredUpAbility.DESCRIPTION: starlight:Primrose's Attacks deal !Starlight:I! additional damage per Attack played this turn.

${ModID}:FisticuffsAbility.NAME: Fisticuffs
${ModID}:FisticuffsAbility.DESCRIPTION: Whenever starlight:Primrose plays an Attack, she gains !Starlight:I! Block.

${ModID}:PileBunkerAbility.NAME: Pile Bunker
${ModID}:PileBunkerAbility.DESCRIPTION: starlight:Primrose's Attacks deal !Starlight:I! percent more damage to enemies with Block.

${ModID}:BruiserAbility.NAME: Bruiser
${ModID}:BruiserAbility.DESCRIPTION: starlight:Primrose's non starlight:Magick Attacks deal !Starlight:I! percent more damage.

${ModID}:BlackMagicAbility.NAME: Black Magick
${ModID}:BlackMagicAbility.DESCRIPTION: {@@}Whenever starlight:Primrose plays a Basic Strike, it now Exhausts and provides !Starlight:I! Strength.

${ModID}:TemperanceAbility.NAME: Temperance
${ModID}:TemperanceAbility.DESCRIPTION: Whenever starlight:Luna gains starlight:SP, she also gains !Starlight:I! Block.

${ModID}:EphemeralAbility.NAME: Ephemeral
${ModID}:EphemeralAbility.DESCRIPTION: Whenever starlight:Luna draws a Status card, she gains !Starlight:I! Block.

${ModID}:CovenantAbility.NAME: Covenant
${ModID}:CovenantAbility.DESCRIPTION: starlight:Luna now Retains starlight:Magick cards, gaining !Starlight:I! starlight:SP per card.

${ModID}:DivinationAbility.NAME: Divination
${ModID}:DivinationAbility.DESCRIPTION: Whenever starlight:Luna starlight:Scries, she also gains !Starlight:I! starlight:Providence.

${ModID}:AstralBodyAbility.NAME: Astral Body
${ModID}:AstralBodyAbility.DESCRIPTION: Whenever starlight:Luna draws a Status card, ALL enemies lose !Starlight:I! HP.
